long_description: An urban ride with bold color, the Scott Sub Speed 20 bike offers a comfortable heads-up pedaling position with capable gearing and powerful disc brakes for cruising through city streets. Butted 6061 aluminum frame offers a sturdy, nimble ride; flat handlebar creates a comfortable, upright riding position. Shimano Alivio shifters guide the Deore rear derailleur and Alivio front derailleur for quick, easy and dependable shifting through the 27 gear combinations. Powerful and responsive Shimano hydraulic disc brakes work powerfully and effectively in all weather conditions. Continental Sport Contact tires offer puncture protection and great all-around rolling performance. Platform pedals let you ride with any shoes you please. Frame features eyelets for fenders and a rear rack (not included); replaceable rear derailleur hanger helps extend the usable life of the frame. Specs on the Scott Sub Speed 20 bike are subject to change.
